price: When We said to the angels, “Prostrate before Adam,” they all prostrated, except Iblīs[44], who refused.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
